## Timeline

### Sunday

- 9:00am | Bus Departs from East Campus Stadium to meet
- 11:00am | Bus arrive at meet
- 7:00pm | Bus departs meet for Hotel

### Monday

- 8:00am | Breakfast
- 8:45am | Bus departs hotel for meet
- 3:40pm | Final event
- 4:00pm | Awards
- 4:30pm | Depart for home
